org.araneaframework.uilib.form
Class FormElementValidationActionListener<C,D>

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.core.StandardActionListener
      org.araneaframework.uilib.form.FormElementValidationActionListener<C,D>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, ActionListener
public class FormElementValidationActionListener<C,D>
extends StandardActionListener

The default implementation of an action listener that must validate the given form element.

Since:
1.1
Author:
Taimo Peelo (taimo@araneaframework.org)
See Also:

Method Detail

processAction

public void processAction(String actionId,
                          String actionParam,
                          InputData input,
                          OutputData output)
                   throws Exception
Description copied from class: StandardActionListener
Action processing method that includes an action parameter. Implementation should be able to handle different actionIds.

Specified by:
processAction in class StandardActionListener
Parameters:
actionId - The ID of the incoming action.
actionParam - The parameter for the action (from request under name ApplicationService.ACTION_PARAMETER_KEY)
input - The request data.
output - The response data.
Throws:
Exception - Any runtime exception that might occur.

writeValidationStatus

protected void writeValidationStatus(Writer out,
                                     String ajaxRequestId,
                                     String formElementId,
                                     boolean valid,
                                     String clientRenderText)
                              throws Exception
This method was added in Aranea 2.0 to separate writing to output stream logic from resolving the values to write. Therefore, it should be easier to customize the process. The parameters are filled in with correct values that should be returned to the client side. This method handles writing them in proper way.

Parameters:
out - The output stream writer to write to.
ajaxRequestId - The current AJAX request ID that also should be returned.
formElementId - The form element ID for which the validation status applies.
valid - A boolean indicating the form element validation status.
clientRenderText - The text to show as provided by FormElementValidationErrorRenderer.
Throws:
Exception - Any exception that may occur during writing.
Since:
2.0

writeRegion

protected void writeRegion(Writer out,
                           String name,
                           String content)
                    throws Exception
Handles the standard way of writing an update region to output stream.

Parameters:
out - The output stream writer to write to.
name - The update region name.
content - The update region content.
Throws:
Exception - Any exception that may occur during writing.
